metadata.title: CVE-2016-9264 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Buffer overflow in the printMP3Headers function in listmp3.c in Libming0.4.7 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-boundsread) via a crafted mp3 file.

criterions.comment: ming: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
